title: Explain how to minimize response bias in survey

content.question: In the design of a survey, which of the following best explains how to minimize response bias?

choices.label: Increase the number of questions in the survey.
Carefully word and field-test survey questions.

content.answer: Carefully word and field-test survey questions.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
